categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Vyord Yanol was a Human male who served the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War. He also served as one of the main advisors of Dark Councilor and head of the Sphere of Imperial Intelligence Darth Jadus. Around 3643 BBY, he was the last person see Jadus alive before the explosion of the Dominator but immediately after, he resigned from Imperial Intelligence and fled to Nar Shaddaa. When Cipher Nine found him Vyord tried to kill them, but was killed himself.
